stories.title: Ask HN: Can software contribute to harnessing clean energy? Where to start?

stories.text:
It's easy to look to world events and decisions being made by those in positions of power and influence and wonder whether greed and selfishness really will be the undoing of humanity. Or at least that an inclusive, empathetic and caring world is a pipe dream.

So to counter this, I would like to ask you what tangible good you see in our present that bodes well for the future?

Hat tip: Ian Drury's song of the same name as the title of this post.

stories.text:
I've been looking for a really good car stereo setup for my car and looks like its either super expensive or very basic.

Is it really hard to make a car PC setup with raspberry pi sort of a unit and ship it with a really good user interface?

And is CarPlay is a paid service that I need to purchase if I want to build my own hardware?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is it really hard to make a good car stereo setup?
